label: Software Security Engineer
description:
Worked mainly on a thirdparty tracker app.
Using python, python the request library, and various web apis, I registered projects into vulnerability scanning apps such as blackduck and anchore (for container vulnerabilty scanning).
Pulled boms.
Registered the third-party dependencies in Talko (an internal app for creating software certificates) and VAMS for monitoring the third-party dependencies.
Challenges:
The main challenge I faced was the poor documentation on the internal apps. Because of the poor documentation, it took me a lot of trials and errors to get the app up and running.
Another challenge was the lack of naming convention: in talko, to register a dependency, we have to filter the list of available dependencies on talko to find its id, which was difficult due to the names not conforming to the same noms.
I worked on updating React components for user-manager app.
Challenges: understanding the way react-ag-grid worked (old and new version), and how the new nokia components worked.
And lastly, the component rendering was a tricky part to handle. Afterall multiple components tried to rerender multiple times, causing a chain reaction. the easiest solution was to use flags and react hoocks such as the should rerender hook.
